ResumeParserData.Experience: Barclays Bank Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2016 - Present  Lead analyst responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Developed risk assessment frameworks and ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. Key Achievements :   Successfully led a project to update the bank's risk assessment procedures, resulting in a 20% increase in efficiency.  Conducted in-depth investigations into high-risk clients, mitigating potential financial crime risks.  Trained and mentored a team of junior analysts, enhancing their skills and knowledge in AML compliance.  Lloyds Banking Group PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2011 - 2016  Performed enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs. Identified and assessed financial crime risks, ensuring adherence to AML regulations.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted thorough due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients.  Prepared detailed reports on findings and recommendations for senior management.  Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure effective risk mitigation.  Assisted in developing and implementing AML policies and procedures.  HSBC Bank AML Analyst  Manchester, UK  2008 - 2011  Supported the AML compliance team in conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential risks.  Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.  Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory bodies.  Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Lead analyst responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Developed risk assessment frameworks and ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Successfully led a project to update the bank's risk assessment procedures, resulting in a 20% increase in efficiency. 
 Conducted in-depth investigations into high-risk clients, mitigating potential financial crime risks. 
 Trained and mentored a team of junior analysts, enhancing their skills and knowledge in AML compliance

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Performed enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs. Identified and assessed financial crime risks, ensuring adherence to AML regulations. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted thorough due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients. 
 Prepared detailed reports on findings and recommendations for senior management. 
 Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure effective risk mitigation. 
 Assisted in developing and implementing AML policies and procedures.

JobProfile.Title: AML Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: anti-money-laundering- analyst, analyst, anti money laundering compliance, aml investigator, analyst aml compliance, analyst anti-money laundering, analyst of anti money laundering, analyst, aml compliance, analyst, aml compl risk management, fraud and aml analyst, analyst - aml compliance, analyst, aml investigations, anti-money laundering analyst, aml compliance analyst, aml surveillance analyst, aml analyst, analyst anti money laundering, aml investigations specialist

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the AML compliance team in conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential risks. 
 Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes. 
 Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory bodies. 
 Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly skilled PEP & High Risk Analyst with 13 years of experience in the banking industry. Proven expertise in conducting enhanced due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Recognized for strong analytical skills, meticulous attention to detail, and a deep understanding of global financial crime risks.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Rachel has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors. 'The candidate has a total experience of 13 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst at Barclays Bank for the last 8.7 years.

Professional Summary : 
Highly skilled PEP & High Risk Analyst with 13 years of experience in the banking industry. Proven expertise in conducting enhanced due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Recognized for strong analytical skills, meticulous attention to detail, and a deep understanding of global financial crime risks.

Education : 
University of Manchester (Russell Group) 
MSc Financial Crime and Compliance, Merit
Graduated : 2010
University of Bristol (Russell Group) 
BSc Economics, Upper Second Class Honours
Graduated : 2008

Professional Experience : 
Barclays Bank Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2016 - Present
Lead analyst responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. Developed risk assessment frameworks and ensured compliance with AML regulations and internal policies.
Key Achievements : 
Successfully led a project to update the bank's risk assessment procedures, resulting in a 20% increase in efficiency.
Conducted in-depth investigations into high-risk clients, mitigating potential financial crime risks.
Trained and mentored a team of junior analysts, enhancing their skills and knowledge in AML compliance.
Lloyds Banking Group PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2011 - 2016
Performed enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients and PEPs. Identified and assessed financial crime risks, ensuring adherence to AML regulations.
Key Responsibilities : 
Conducted thorough due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients.
Prepared detailed reports on findings and recommendations for senior management.
Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure effective risk mitigation.
Assisted in developing and implementing AML policies and procedures.
HSBC Bank AML Analyst
Manchester, UK
2008 - 2011
Supported the AML compliance team in conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.
Key Contributions : 
Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential risks.
Analyzed transaction patterns to detect signs of money laundering and other financial crimes.
Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports for senior management and regulatory bodies.
Participated in regular training sessions to stay updated on AML regulations and best practices.

Skills :
